user_input: Create a Premium commercial for a product in the style of Anime, Cinematic, Cyberpunk. Target platform: Hulu. Duration: 15s.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Expand your perception. Discover new realities.

scenes.visual_prompt: In a cyberpunk-infused anime style, a sleek, obsidian-black 'ChronoLens' augmented reality device, crafted from brushed titanium and composite glass, rests on a futuristic display pedestal. Subtle electric blue energy pulses within its core, casting faint reflections on its polished surface. Cinematic neon backlighting and a soft key light illuminate its premium finish. Medium close-up, perfectly centered within the safe zone.
scenes.audio_prompt: Low, resonant hum of advanced technology, distant, almost inaudible synth-wave city ambience.
scenes.motion_prompt: Slow, deliberate dolly push-in towards the device, with a subtle Steadicam drift.

scenes.visual_prompt: The same obsidian-black 'ChronoLens' augmented reality device from scene 1, now effortlessly integrated, projects a vivid, interactive holographic interface of a hyper-stylized neon-drenched metropolis, swirling around an unseen user's eye-line. Intricate micro-details on the device's surface become visible as light shifts. The scene maintains the anime, cinematic, cyberpunk aesthetic with deep purples and electric blues dominating.
scenes.audio_prompt: Crisp, soft electronic interface sounds and atmospheric data flow, building gently in intensity.
scenes.motion_prompt: Smooth, controlled orbital camera movement around the floating holographic interface and the device, revealing its immersive activation.
